Content: 3*n37489a0320*turn over (b) there are several types of stem cell found in humans.  the table below shows some features of two types of stem cell.  if the feature applies to the stem cell place a tick (9) in the box and if it does not apply, place a cross (8) in the box.(2)featurestotipotentstem cellpluripotent stem cellcan give rise to totipotent stem cellscan give rise to differentiated cells *(c) human bone marrow contains stem cells that can give rise to various types of blood cell including white blood cells.  suggest how a stem cell in the bone marrow can become a differentiated blood cell.(4)(total for question 1 = 9 marks)
